The whole game is a masterpiece! Stunning views, absolutely awesome scientifical background of the plot and non-stop interaction with Elizabeth - it is truly the most authentical game I played in years and possibly the best shooter ever. Assuming I didn't like the original Bioshock, I was really, REALLY impressed how Bioshock Infinite got me! I recommend it so much!!!
This game's ending broken me. 10/10
Ganz nett. Die Story steht im Vordergrund. Da erreichte Dinge bei einem Erneuten durchlauf zurückgesetzt werden, lohnt sich ein erneutes Durchspielen nicht.

Juego que con la misma dinámica que en las anteriores entregas sigue enganchando por un guión con fuerza propia. 
Bioshock sin duda es una saga que se tiene que jugar.

Amazing edition to the series, the game draws you in with the beautiful Comlumbia! I like Rapture for it's dark and grim feel but Columbia is so beautiful that you'll forget about Rapture all together! The story line  is fantasitc and if not one of the best story lines I've ever played. The ending to this game is something else though and if you love BioShock, then the ending is as good, if not better then the other 2 games, honestly, this is probably the best BioShock in my opinion and that is such high praise after I was sceptical of it moving away from Rapture. But in a way, I'm glad it did!

The gameplay of Bioshock Infinite is confused at best. You're constantly flooded with combat, yet it's hardly compelling. Exploration has, at best, been shoehorned into the game. 

In general, this title should only be digested if you're looking for AAA production values, a tame sci-fi story, and don't mind repetitive, mindless, unimaginative gameplay.

Bestes Spiel was ich jemals gespielt habe. Klasse Gesichte und unübertreffbares Ende, vorallem für denjenigen der sich ungespoilert mit der Geschichte auseinander setzt und genießt. Nichts für Durchrenner, sondern für Genießer die sich das Spiel über gedulden können. Es lohnt sich.

Одна из лучших игр уходящего года)

If you haven't already played BioShock Infinite... why not?

Mechanically, it's a fairly straightforward shooter.  But don't let that fool you.  The vision and execution of Columbia is deep, rich, and intense, and Elizabeth is the best NPC of any game I've played in years (however, The Last Of Us is on my to-do list in the next week, so this could yet change).

Play it.  Play it twice - once for the experience, and once to fully appreciate the Usual Suspects-level depth of foreshadowing of the twist.
Great story, shitty action. Only good for one playthrough. Nothing 10/10 about it.

Und sollte man es doch unerwartet bis zum Ende schaffen, ergibt auf einmal das ganze Erlebte einen Sinn.
Sehr nettes Game sowohl vom spielen als auch der Story her.
Após jogar o Inifnite sou obrigado a comprar a expansão, recomento o jogo a todos, é o tipo de jogo que corrobora para com a afirmação de que jogos são arte.

Though it didn't quite capture the same awe and wonder that the first Bioshock did, (For me anyway.) it was still an enjoyable ride. 

If I had to offer some advice, I'd say that you absolutely need to play it on hard- especially on your first playthrough.

Просто-напросто превосходно! Интеллектуальный шутер с великолепной историей, один из самых шедевральных и красивых в истории компьютерных игр. Воздушный город Колумбия, 1912 год, дирижабли, аэротрассы, секреты, энергетики, турели, временные порталы, маяки, звезды, звезды, маяки... Лжепророк Букер ДеВитт и несравненная Элизабет, Пророк Комсток и Анна ДеВитт, кто они? Тот самый случай, когда вместо того, чтобы кромсать солдат Колумбии, "зависаешь" открыв рот по нескольку минут, любуясь красотами воздушного города и заглядываешь в каждый угол, магазин или дом как на экскурсии. Дизайнерам уровней аплодирую стоя! Финал истории поразил наповал. Irrational Games, Bravo!

O jogo é muito bom, a história é compreensível, fica um pouco confusa se você não tiver jogado os outros jogos da série (assim como eu), mas não é nada que chegue a atrapalhar. A jogabilidade é ótima, existem umas habilidades que te ajudam durante o desenrolar da história, as armas também são muito boas! Existe legenda em Português do Brasil, é só ativa-la clicando em "Propriedades" na sua própria biblioteca Steam e entrar na aba "Idioma".

Realmente valeu e muito o dinheiro gasto. xD

Bioshock Infinite is a great game. The mechanics -  as compared to some new ones which Bioshock's are much better - proved to be one of the best fps produced in year 2013. I've played this game 5 times - before buying - and still enjoy it after so long, due to the awesome story telling and plot twists. Despite the way of combat in Bioshock remains unchanged, the plot of the game covers the cons straight away. If Irrational Games would continue making a 3rd Bioshock Infinte, I would definitely buy it.

Игра действительно чудесная! Купил даже и Seasons Pass, гораздо лучше 1 и 2 части игры. Хотя возможно симпатичная мадемуазель сделала свое дело. В общем 9/10 смело можно поставить игре. Концовка огорчила, да и сюжет запутали сильно, с этими разрывами. :)

One of the best games on my Steam account. The storyline and visuals are amazing.

*MINOR SPOILERS ABOUT THE BEGINNING OF BIOSHOCK INFINITE AHEAD*
You are Booker DeWitt a man in debt, now you have to pay it off by bringing the girl (Elizabeth) to New York. The year is 1912 and the floating city of Columbia resigned from the US in 1909.Welcome to Columbia, a utopia in the clouds (the opposite of Rapture which is a distopia under the sea), but like all utopias there are problems.

The beginning of Bioshock Infinite begins with you on a rowboat with two other people who don't pay any attention to you whatsoever. You go into a lighthouse and at the top there is a chair, you get in the chair. Suddenly the chair becomes a rocket and shoots you up into the air (note that it is pouring rain) and as soon as you get above the rainclouds you see the floating city of Columbia, its magnificent.

Bioshock Ininite has a standing chance to float it's way to Game of the Year but the repetitiveness of the combat system is it's dead weight. The combat is extremely fun at first but then gets older and older as the game progresses. Once you meet Elizabeth she can gie you extra ammo, health packs, and salts (used for magic powers). Although this is helpful of her it really makes the game way easier then it should (except on hard). Unlike most AI, Elizabeth is smart, actually smart. She won't stand in a doorway and block you in or wander way off into La-la-land, she sticks with you (most of the time.) Irrational games really worked hard to make Elizabeth the perfect AI. The story in this game is incredible and has the greatest plot twist in the history of video games. You might expect a plot twist but this one will hit you like a baseball to the face. Irrational games really worked hard on this game and you can tell. I highly reccomend Bioshock Infinite to anyone and everyone.

By far the best game I've played in a very long time.  The visuals are gorgeous and the story is INCREDIBLE!  Your head will hurt after the last 25 or so minutes.  The flow of gameplay is much better than the first two titles as well.  It's not as much go here, get this, come back, next area.  There's also a lot more customization in Infinite with more guns to choose from with multiple upgrades, Vigors each with upgrades, and health/shield/salt upgrades.

TLDR: Buy it, Play it, Love it.

Jack of all trades, master of none.

Bioshock infinite is a shooter based on the existing franchise, however the gameplay felt poorly planned.  The firefights were uninspired bouts of you against massive bullet sponges.  There is little incentive to use your elemental powers as the enemies are easily defeated without.  The combat seems to encourage the use of cover, however it lacks a key component: usable cover.  Each fight is approached the same way, and although the game lets you use your powers to place traps, you will almost never find yourself in a place to use them.  Each fight is a head-on bout of how many bullets of your seemingly infinite supply it will take to progress in the story.

speaking of the story, it has no focus.  In the beginning, it is a portrayal of a society in the clouds full of religious bigotry and racism.  It soon turns into a completely pointless display of how much Ken Levine knows about theoretical physics, apparently just enough to think he knows what he's doing when he has really only scratched the surface.  Although at times interesting, by the end it does not make sense with itself and still baffles the community and even Levine himself.  The story will leave you feeling empty, as it makes no remark on the social injustice happening in columbia.

The game tries to do too many stories and fails to complete them effectively, making the whole game feel both unguided and lazily put together.  If there was a more clear direction as to where they wanted to go with the story, it would have been at least redeemable in that aspect.  The gameplay should be completely revamped, as the actual first-person-shooter aspect is neither fun nor rewarding.  Every weapon uninspired, every special ability almost pointless to use.

Bioshock: Infinite gets a 2/5

Я очень люблю эту игру. Она просто восхитительна! Советую чуть ли не всем. Но вот сегодня решил пройти DLC. Она тоже очень и очень хороша, но в конце меня она ужасно разочаровала. Нет, не сюжетом, а тем, что я заплатил 10 баксов за 2 минуты игры. Она настолько быстро закончилась, что я и моргнуть не успел. Я на полном серьёзе её могу за полчаса пройти, если буду бежать сломя голову, если не быстрее. Это просто ужас какой-то...

This game is probably the best thing I've ever played. Throughout the game you build a connection with Elizabeth that you want to last. It is a great game. I have the willies from it. Cannot recomend enough.

Confusingly, in todays market where technology can produce such wonderful gems, games have a tendancy to stagnate. It seems that anyone can now make a game. But to make a game so engaging, a game that makes you sit on the edge of your chair, a game that makes your day dissappear and hours become minutes...thats a game worth playing.

Not being one for the Bioshock games, i was slightly skeptical about it. But having it pop up on the sales and with the girlfriends urging, I splashed the cash and took a trip into unknown waters. 

What I found is game so well thought out, with new game mechanics, fast paced action and a fantastic story line that still has my head spinning. Some games can have an unfinished feel...not this one! Some games can feel clunky and outdated....again, not this one!

Happily give this 5 out of 5. 

Cannot wait to try the DLC.

Bioshock infinite is a breathtaking game with some truly unique and dynamic gameplay. This is one of my favorite games because of how beautiful it looks and how there are really no games like it on the market. As with all the Bioshock games though some people have difficulty getting it running at first but just update your drivers and you should be fine.
